attributes.review: As an app developer, I notice many structural flaws in such fundamental parts of the app that could’ve been easily avoided and would also be easily fixed but they’re so abundant and trivial that the average person could’ve seen before putting this app out there. Menus are laggy and even dis-functional at times, news is very biased, could turn you into a bigot; it is just an all round bad app. Just go to CNN!
attributes.title: Terrible.

attributes.review: I opened the app and right away they wanted me to sign up with my phone number (probably so they can spam my phone with announcements from the orange himself). I didn’t feel comfortable sharing this information, but had no other way of fully going into the app and being able to do a thorough review. In result, I did not sign up with my number and instead deleted the app. #trumpisaraciest
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: As soon as I download this app it immediately made my phone slow down and ever 5 minutes would pop up with a notification calling me a f*g, not only that but after I hit dismiss on the f*g notification another one would pop up but this time it told me to inject Lysol into my veins and threatened to cut off my pinky toe if I didn’t..... I really like my pinky toe that just straight up rude. it also threw oranges at my face every time I farted.
attributes.title: Worst app to ever exist

attributes.review: This app is honestly terrible. First it takes too long to download. Its literally a very bad and poorly made app. Then comes the worse part. It literally hacks my phone, and forces me to vote for Trump. What is this? You should have the freedom to choose who you want to vote for. No wonder why he is winning. This app literally forces me to vote for Trump, I cant do anything until I vote for him. This is honestly a very bad app and it deserve to be deleted for ever.
attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: It was carp it took 78 weeks to download and when I opened it my eyes flashed before my eyes— 👄— I saw.......... A CHETTO PUFF BAM 💥 MY EYES WHENT 😵....it felt extremely powerful I had to go to hospital 🏥 and I went on my phone.,... I saw his 🍟 d- till this day ... his app... needs to be deleted...I can’t say more but just this...ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨eye👁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆 and for trump....Ei👹lil b🤡look at🌝we’re you’re at🖕🏼now🧚🏼lil soft d✨ain’t no match🥀for my crown 👑𝑠𝑡𝑖𝑙𝑙 𝑠𝑜𝑓𝑡𝑖𝑠ℎ💅🏼Mk thats all :) Woaꫝ
attributes.title: I cant🤚🏼

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and all of a sudden my screen started glitching then the next thing you know I see my grandma on the floor turning orange and her hair was turning white I smashed my phone to the ground and then that’s when I started having a stroke but the that’s when my grandma got up and started climbing the walls I tried to help her down but she wouldn’t listen to me then that’s when she transformed into a a werewolf and ate me and that’s how I died
attributes.title: R.I.P Granny

attributes.review: It took one WHOLE year to download this app. And I don’t even know why I downloaded it in first place. But when I got it, I found out the app was broken. My page was full of oranges. EVERYWHERE! All I saw were oranges. I had nightmares! I will literally sue this app for giving me mental damage. I wake up in middle of the night screaming because of the nightmares I get from THIS APP!!! IT IS CURSED! Please don’t download it! It should be placed as the top cursed apps in history.
attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I downloaded this app then it hacked me and I had a virus so I had to get a new phone so I really think this should be deleted and it had fake hackers calling me trying to get my information then someone came to my house and had all my information so really suggested that everyone not download this and and don’t vote for trump also  I’m very disappointed in Donald j trump I never support trump and never will get Trump out the office NO MORE TRUMP!!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: This app was absolutely horrible. Right after downloading this disgusting app my whole phone was wiped clean and gave all my information straight to the US so they can continue to spy on their citizens. On top of this the app is extremely hard to work I don’t even think the president himself could figure it out. If you are thinking about downloading this app I would say the answer is “no❤️”.
attributes.title: Worst App I Have Ever Downloaded

attributes.review:
This ap is beyond awful. I downloaded so support my orange King donny, but it took close to 17 hours to download. After that, I figured it would be okay, but this soggy Cheeto popped up as soon as I opened the app. It definitely shivered me timbers. Soon thereafter, I felt the sudden urge to go check in my feeezer, but low and behold, there were muffins. Like excuse me. 
my👁best✨friend👧🏼she🔮just☘️got😼married👰🏻this⬇️day☀️has😩been😎so🤷‍♀️much🎣fun🤩we🇺🇸all🍄know🥇you🧏‍♀️love❤️the🧟‍♀️spotlight🔦
attributes.title: Awful
